16f91dda1a15e0e3c3d7142a159f17db72c06d0f.commitMessage: Issue #4676: move AbstractTypeAwareCheck and ClassResolver to javadoc

027d1e2c99655af53327eae8474f312f89b448f6.commitMessage:
Invert conditional expressions that are negated. #1555

Fixes `NegatedConditional` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports conditional expressions whose conditions are negated. Flipping the order of the conditional expression branches will usually increase the clarity of such statements.

084809c3b9e0d039c818cc4d8c5e640ea9e26525.commitMessage:
Simplify empty string check. #1555

Fixes `Simplify empty string check` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports .equals() being called to compare a String with an empty string. It is normally more performant to test a String for emptiness by comparing its .length() to zero instead.

d734bff020d3525c811a0b273021a5ac5665ade8.commitMessage: ClassResolver updated to follow Cyclomatic Complexity rule. #954
